page.title: 02Local Churches.
page.content: There are many Churches and places of worship within the area. A large number of the world's religions are represented. George Nairn Briggs is the Vicar of St.Peter's Church,Morden, which was built in 1933.There are a large number of murals,painted by Peter Paelez,both on the inside and outside walls depicting the Life of Christ.During the War, it was hit by a fire bomb and the roof had to be replaced. William Mullenger is the Vicar of All Saint's Church,Hackbridge.The Church is fifty one years old.The pulpit was carved by German Prisoners of War.The pews in the Church cost Â£385 each to replace,so that few of them do get replaced.
